description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

code.description: The identifier of the error message

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

overrideDetails.description: Maturity Date is not a Working Day
Have you received Loan Agreement/AAA*203 from 100336}RECEIVED_NOT RECEIVED

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerId.description: The id of the 3rd party who sold the product on behalf of the institution.

agentArrangementId.description: The id of the arrangement with the 3rd party that has sold the product on behalf of the institution

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

reason.description: Contains the reason for performing the current activity

changeAmount.description: Indicates the amount by which the original commitment amount increased or decreased.

term.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

revolving.description: Indicates if commitment is revolving or non revolving in nature

updateLimit.description: Flag to define if the limits are to be booked or not at the time of issuing the pre-advice LC. Allowed values: - YES - NO (same as null) - null (default).

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerId.description: The id of the 3rd party who sold the product on behalf of the institution.

agentArrangementId.description: The id of the arrangement with the 3rd party that has sold the product on behalf of the institution

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

reason.description: Contains the reason for performing the current activity

effectiveRate.description: Indicates the actual interest rate applied for the account after adjustment/tier calculation/based on basic or Periodic index value

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

value.description: The value of the field on which the Alert criteria is based

linkedArrangement.description: The account which is linked for calculating interest that should be applied to this account

periodicIndex.description: Denotes an index which points to the right period of the securities or holdings.

effectiveRate.description: Indicates the actual interest rate applied for the account after adjustment/tier calculation/based on basic or Periodic index value

marginType.description: Defines whether there are single or multiple margins to be considered while arriving at the applicable interest rate  Allowed values:  null (default): multiple margins may be defined SINGLE: only a single margin is allowed

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

changeAmount.description: Indicates the amount by which the original commitment amount increased or decreased.

term.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

revolving.description: Indicates if commitment is revolving or non revolving in nature

updateLimit.description: Flag to define if the limits are to be booked or not at the time of issuing the pre-advice LC. Allowed values: - YES - NO (same as null) - null (default).

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerId.description: The id of the 3rd party who sold the product on behalf of the institution.

agentArrangementId.description: The id of the arrangement with the 3rd party that has sold the product on behalf of the institution

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerId.description: The id of the 3rd party who sold the product on behalf of the institution.

agentArrangementId.description: The id of the arrangement with the 3rd party that has sold the product on behalf of the institution

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

reason.description: Contains the reason for performing the current activity

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerId.description: The id of the 3rd party who sold the product on behalf of the institution.

agentArrangementId.description: The id of the arrangement with the 3rd party that has sold the product on behalf of the institution

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

reason.description: Contains the reason for performing the current activity

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

changeAmount.description: Indicates the amount by which the original commitment amount increased or decreased.

term.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

revolving.description: Indicates if commitment is revolving or non revolving in nature

updateLimit.description: Flag to define if the limits are to be booked or not at the time of issuing the pre-advice LC. Allowed values: - YES - NO (same as null) - null (default).

partyId.description: Allows capturing of customers or person entities to be part of the relationship. If partyType is selected as Customer, then the system will allow only customer Ids to be captured into this field. If partyType is selected as Person or Entity, then system will allow only personEntity Ids to be captured into this field.

partyRole.description: Indicates the role of a customer or party, Eg: Benefial Owner, Nominee etc

agentCustomerId.description: The id of the 3rd party who sold the product on behalf of the institution.

agentArrangementId.description: The id of the arrangement with the 3rd party that has sold the product on behalf of the institution

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productVariation.description: It defines the type of a customer based on criteria defined by Bank, Eg: Gold Customer, Mobile Banking Customer

pricingSelection.description: If the account has an associated pricing arrangement, the way the pricing is applied is indicated from standard set of values - automatic, manual or No Pricing.

pricingPlan.description: Indicates the Pricing Plan of an account, it gives preferential interest rate/charge schedule based on customer segment

rewardsArrangementId.description: Indicates the Rewards account id assigned to a financial account(Loans,Deposits)

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

arrangementEffectiveDate.description: It is a date on/upon which an account is considered to take effect

reason.description: Contains the reason for performing the current activity

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.
